an1.31-40:4.1: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
an1.31-40:4.2: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
